Assembly guide

For this section you will need:

Parts

  • 1 Liquid Adhesive
  • 14 M3 hex Nut
  • 38 M3x8 Pozi pan machine screw

Tools

  • 1 Pozidriv PZ1 screw driver

Step 1: Electronics box

  • Assemble the Electronics box with the laser cut parts (Ecase_back,Ecase_front,Ecase_base,Ecase_RnL) to form a box then fasten the box with M3 hex Nut and M3x8 Pozi pan machine screw using Pozidriv PZ1 screw driver to tighten the screws.

Step 2: Electronics board

  • Position the Pcb board in line with the holes on the side of the box assembly. Then using M3x8 Pozi pan machine screwfasten the board using Pozidriv PZ1 screw driver to tighten the screws.

Step 3: Electronics cover

Do not print the latch_assembly as one part

  • Snap fit the latch handle on to the latch base part to from the Latch_assembly.

  • Locate the holes on the side of the box and using M3 hex Nut and M3x8 Pozi pan machine screw fasten the assembled latch to the box uisng Pozidriv PZ1 screw driver.

  • Place the Electronics top on top of the box and fasten it using the latch assembly.

Step 4: Maker beam frame

  • Place 2 makerbeam xl 200mm and 150 mm end to end at their meeting point joing them together using corner. to make a square frame. Using M3x8 Pozi pan machine screw fasten the corners to the maker beam xl uisng Pozidriv PZ1 screw driver. Repeat the process for all the corners to make a rectangle.

  • At the corners of the square frame fasten horizontally 4 more maker beam xl using M3x8 Pozi pan machine screw.

Step 5: Adding the enclosure

  • Slide the platform support parts on opposite sides of the pillars and on top of them place the Platform base.

  • Slide the feeding wall making sure it goes all the way to the bottom. Then for the led series wall will slide up to the platform and on top of it slide the curved wall. .

  • With the side entry wall press fit the tunnel connector and the tunnel clamp on either side of the plasric sheet.

  • Slide the side entry wall and the side plain wall through the pillars of the box.

  • With the lid pieces, hinge, trap latch and groove pins. Locate the holes on the lid and allign the hinge and latch then press fit the groove pins on the holes to fasten the latch and hinge on the clear sheet.

  • Place the assembled lid on the box assembly. Then using M3x8 Pozi pan machine screw fasten the lid tightening the screws using Pozidriv PZ1 screw driver.

  • On the bottom of the box along the makerbeam xl groove slide the guide rail and make sure it is at the middle and fits tightly.

Step 6: Excrete panel

  • Using the Excrete box case parts case back, case base,case front, case right, case left and Liquid Adhesive stick the parts together and waith for them to dry.

Step 7: Putting things together

  • Place the box assembly on top of the electronics case and close the latches to make the assembly stable.

  • The assembled tray in should slid on the assembly in the assembly to make a collector for the animal excretion during experiment.
